title: Orange Guidance Tomestone Pack
description: A pack of templates, conjunctions, and word lists for use in the Dalamud plugin Orange Guidance Tomestone.

name.description: The user-friendly name of this pack.

visible.description: Whether this pack is visible to users or archived for backwards-compatibility reasons.

order.description: The order in a client's UI that this pack should appear, 1 being first, 2 second, etc. 0 should be used for archived packs.

templates.description: An array of template strings, using {0} for where the chosen word should be inserted (if any).

anyOf.description: A template that should use the global word list defined at the root of this document.
A template that should use its own word list defined on the template object.

template.description: The template string, using {0} for where the chosen word should be inserted (if any).

words.description: A list of words for this template specifically.

conjunctions.description: An array of conjunctions, one of which may be inserted between two templates to form a longer message.

words.description: An array of word lists for using with the templates.

name.description: The user-friendly name of this word list.

words.description: The words in this word list.
